root.name: Miracle Ropit's Adventure in 2100
root.description: OverviewMiracle Ropit's Adventure in 2100 is a platformer with a cutesy sci-fi presentation. The player controls a girl in a robot suit as she makes her away across various side-scrolling platformer levels. While in the robot suit, she is able to shoot and destroy enemies. Getting hit once will eject her from the broken suit, leaving her without a means to fight the enemies - at this point she can only avoid them.Like many games developed by Micronics, it is regarded as being of fairly poor quality.
